hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.KF Storms Grotto Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)
locations.Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the enemy souls of Ganon's Castle# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #5# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Grass 1

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #a small fish (adult)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Anything not saved will be lost.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #unfreezing King Zora and giving him the Prescription# rewards...^ #the enemy souls of Deku Tree# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #4# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #19# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a medium-sized fish (adult)# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Barinade#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Third Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?
